website_summaries.verdict: A very affordable sea salt spray that creates texture and beautiful waves.
pros: Doesn't leave hair sticky or heavy
Best for fine to medium thickness hair that is short to medium in length
cons: Not ideal for thick, long hair as it doesn't produce that many waves with this hair type

customer_reviews.title: The smell is great!
customer_reviews.text: I think so far this is the best sea salt spray that i have ever tried. It even outbid bumble and bumble. My hair is more wavy and texturized after this spray, lasts the whole day even during humidity. I have mid length, blond (bleached) hair, they’re not really damaged but they’ve never been the strongest. I tried it on while damn and dry and it works both ways totally fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bogomolova Elena

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for straight hair
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for product that adds just some texture or slight waves to my hair. This product leaves cakey feeling, weighing down and doesn’t give any actual texture. There is a cheap drugstore sea salt spray that is better for my hair at a third of the price. I am very happy paying for a product that works but I will not be purchasing this brand again. The seller was great though, fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Danielle.engelskirger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product in the small size. I love it! So...I sized up! It arrived ahead of expected, packaged well and was a good value!
customer_reviews.author: carol m mahoney

customer_reviews.title: gives your hair volume
customer_reviews.text: i like this product it gives your hair volume, and you can use it on different hair styles. i have very fine hair and it works very well. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Msj

customer_reviews.title: Yuck, left my hair greasy!!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this last week & boy was I disappointed! I have lots of fine European hair, I thought this would add texture and make my hair look & feel thicker, but nope. I sprayed on my slightly damp hair, after shampooing & drying a bit, then tried scrunching and air drying, but my hair didn’t feel dry for hours. Finally, I tried brushing my hair and it just hung and looked and felt greasy, gross. I checked the ingredients, which were difficult to read and it has castor oil in it, no wonder it left my hair greasy, oooh yuck!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebel Flower Girl

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE!! No gross residue, perfect hold
customer_reviews.text: This is a dream product. Helps hold style in even my stick straight locks. Absorbs oil in unwashed hair, gives body and gorgeous texture hours and hours after initial use.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Washington

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Best sea salt spray! Honestly I’ve tried them all and this one is great! Doesn’t make your hair feel heavy or oily. Smells great
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Good pre styler for the price
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt really have a scent so that's up to youbifbits good or bad. But the hold and texture it provides is really good. I have flappy, thin, straight hair and this product really helps my hair get texture and volume. 4 stars for texture, 3 stars for volume. Also the price really makes this one worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: This does not give me the body and texture I was looking for for my fine hair. Does not work on clean hair just leaves build up!
customer_reviews.author: Tina S

customer_reviews.title: Product was good but caused allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: The product was a good product, but it aggravated by sinuses. If you are sensitive to fragrance, this will likely cause a reaction.
customer_reviews.author: ASB

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: The only dislike is that the bottle could be bigger so I didn't have to have buy a bunch. I have thick black hair and this stuff feels great. Kinda has that salty residue afterwards, in a textured way.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Chang

customer_reviews.title: I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It smells great and gives great volume. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honest Seller
customer_reviews.text: Super Fast, Superb & Very Reliable... Great Transaction & Honest Seller! Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Elgert Jr

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on the recommendation of a YouTuber. Looks nice for about 10 min, then dries out and my hair is exactly how it was before.
customer_reviews.author: Julius T.

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, Easy to Layer, Caution: Scent
customer_reviews.text: I spritz it from mid-length to the ends once i've combed through my hair fresh out of the shower, then again once it's a little more dry just to style it a little. The smell reminds me of a Nautica cologne, and it can get a little overpowering when you're layering, but on the plus-side you can tell it lasts all day!
customer_reviews.author: coacha82

customer_reviews.title: It's still awesome though. It really helps a lot with thin ...
customer_reviews.text: The bottle looks a little bit different now than the product picture. It's still awesome though. It really helps a lot with thin hair, and this stuff is way cheaper than the salt spray that most salons will try to sell you.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T.

customer_reviews.title: Used daily
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this ever day and he loves it. His hair looks great after he uses this to style it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Burke

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and gives texture and definition to hair
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and gives texture and definition to hair. I naturally have the beach wave type hair and this enhanced that. This is my favorite sea salt spray and I've tried a bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Proton

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sea salt spray, it helps keep my curls looking curly not crunchy & I love the scent!
customer_reviews.author: Pamella McFall

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Adds volume to your hair very well in a beach look
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Smells pretty good and seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son and he really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: kellysiu

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: wasn't my favorite product and it could be worse. it kind of reminded me of the smell of aqua net which took me back to the 80s which isn't so bad (ha). overall too stiff and drying on my fine hair. i would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kg1

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Did not work as good as other brands I've tried. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: No added body...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this just makes my hair fall flat and is heavy. May just be my hair...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine haif
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff... I have super fine hair and it gives me texture and volume.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria J. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could buy this particular brand in my local store because it is awesome and smells terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Brach s.

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, if you don't mind a weird resudue.
customer_reviews.text: Good: The smell, the bottle (dispenses it in a fine mist) Bad: It leaves a weird residue on my hair and I have much better results with other products that are less expensive and just as good.
customer_reviews.author: naturenymph022

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this spray
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this spray! It has been great for my daughters hair this summer. She has just enough curl to be pretty, but not usually the whole day. This keeps the wave nice and can be sprayed on dry hair when it starts looking too bed head!
customer_reviews.author: Am F

customer_reviews.title: Skip a shower for a few days
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It's funny... I take this with me to the beach and it makes my salty ocean hair even saltier and oceanier.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best value for the price, you dont have to spend a lot of money for the salt water, this product is enough!
customer_reviews.author: Sergei74

customer_reviews.title: I use Toni and Guy shampoo and conditioner and I REALLY wanted to like this.
customer_reviews.text: Ahhh, I use Toni and Guy shampoo and conditioner and I REALLY wanted to like this...TBH, I think there are a few better Sea Salt Sprays and Texturizers...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: This spray works and smells great! Sometimes I just spray it on my hair ...
customer_reviews.text: First time using sea spray to help give my hair texture and styling hold. This spray works and smells great! Sometimes I just spray it on my hair just for the scent. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Ichiho

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair heavy and dull
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to do anything. It is just an extra step in the morning. When I brush my hair out after it has dried, this product leaves a buildup and makes my hair seem heavy and dull.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: does nothing, I have fine thin hair that's wavy. I have used other sea sprays that have worked, I thought I would try this. It lessened the waves, made it frizzy (which never happens) and left it flat. waste of money. Wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lataille

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: This does absolutely nothing for my hair. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My wife love this for her hair. Many positive comments and friends are now using it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Troy R. Bayham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Spray is nice and gives my hair volume! The spray isn't sticky either and lasts throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Djackson

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Adds just enough texture to my very straight
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Adds just enough texture to my very straight, overly soft hair.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Does not leave me looking like a beach bunny!
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair but a lot of it, and when I use this product I like how my hair looks... for a few minutes. My hair loses its texture and goes flat within about 30min of application. For the rest of the day my hair looks just kind of dirty and limp.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gives texture so curling iron will hold my fine slippery hair. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money! I used to love another brand of sea salt texturizing spray but they haven't made that in years. I always liked how my hair looked, it gave it body but it also gave my wavy hair some great curl. This spray on the other hand doesn't give my hair any body and just makes it oily. And it smells like perfume. It really is just like spraying a water and scented oil mix on my hair. I actually use jojoba oil on my hair sometimes and that doesn't make it look greasy or oily. Save your money, this is a terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Grrrrrrll

customer_reviews.title: Good for fine hair
customer_reviews.text: Like - have baby fine hair and it does the trick for more body.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Gives hair a tousled, textured look without the crunchiness of other hair products. I love how natural my hair looks when I use this, like I just came from the beach. And another plus is that it smells great! I don't even put on perfume the days I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brynn Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this spray, it is perfect for casual hair days.
customer_reviews.author: erica pincus bouldin

customer_reviews.title: Magic for my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have the most boring limp hair ever. I always wanted a sea salt spray to give my hair some texture but the products were way to expensive for me. I stumbled upon toni&guy in a sample box and instantly fell in love. It really is magic for my hair. It allows me to have that tussled look and i adore it. It smells amazing and can be used on wet or dry hair. The best thing is that this product is affordable! I can finally have the hair i want without having to spend a fortune! Toni&guy sea salt spray is now a daily routine in my house. Try it. You wont be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl leighton

customer_reviews.title: The smellllll
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I love the smell as well :) people notice you're around
customer_reviews.author: Elena G

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is yummy. I think it smells like cinnamon. I use it when my hair is damp and then just scrunch my hair. It works well and also doesn't feel crunchy all ALL. I usually use a cheapy spray gel (daily) and scrunch...but might switch to this for daily use. It is a little spendy, but the texture of the hair looks better and less.....ghetto?
customer_reviews.author: FluffyEskimo

customer_reviews.title: I have only achieved the perfect beach wave look once since owning this product
customer_reviews.text: for my wavy, semi-thick, medium length tresses, I have only achieved the perfect beach wave look once since owning this product. it acts as a lighter hair spray that will not be sticky nor leave white residue when you run your fingers through your hair. i currently use it to give my hair a bit more rough texture and tame frizziness. it is okay.
customer_reviews.author: Eklektikos

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but did't really work for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sucker for trying things to get my fine straight hair, do something other than hang there. Well this is another try and didn't work very good. The smell was nice and easy to use, but it didn't add any additional texture to my hair. Still on the hunt for that perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Travel nerd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The item was what was expected and arrived extremely quick.
customer_reviews.author: vsutter

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't quite work as I expected... My hair always just felt dry when I used this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's good for texturizing, specially if you have long hair,this is a product I hadn't used but Toni and Guy make good products.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Priscila

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic beach wave curls
customer_reviews.text: My hair is wavy/curly i would say 2b type when wet and doesnt keep a good curl though when dry its more straight with a slight wave. When i use this and air dry my hair my curls are so much more defined.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair look greasy
customer_reviews.text: I only use salt spray on my hair to add texture and keep fly-away hairs under control. This spray worked but I felt like it would make my hair look oily and dirty. I would apply a little bit of spray to my damp hair after showering and within an hour or two my hair would just look greasy. Not the brand of salt spray I will be using.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Yarborough

customer_reviews.title: MY SON LOVES THIS HAIR PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: MY ADULT SON PUT THIS ON HIS CHRISTMAS WISH LIST AND HE WAS SO EXCITED TO GET A FULL SIZE FOR CHRISTMAS. HE IS A STYLISH 31 YEAR OLD AND LOVES THIS PRODUCT AND IT WORKS GREAT FOR HIM!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smelled nasty
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this in 2015 when lauren curtis suggested this product. However, i think this product may be fake on amazon. Because this spray smells HORRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Non B.

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for summer wavy hair! It is slightly sticky so I prefer to use it on wet hair, but it can be used on wet or dry. Perfect if you have curly hair, helpful if you have wavy hair and super key if you have straight hair that you want to curl. I fall in the middle and I like that it boosts my existing waves. I don't find myself using it outside of the summer time months, but I definitely like it and pull it out each May to use!
customer_reviews.author: C. L. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for long hair.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of sea salt sprays, but hands down Toni & Guy is one of my favorite. I have really long straight hair, It doesn’t leave my hair feeling like a matted birds nest. While giving me that beach wavy hair.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa O Filoni

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Weighs my hair down too much. I was hoping for a lightweight product that would make my hair more choppy and texturized looking, but no. I have medium thickness. It just leaves it soft and saggy.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyMiche

customer_reviews.title: It left my hair feeling dirty, but I have very thick hair
customer_reviews.text: Hard for me to judge. It left my hair feeling dirty, but I have very thick hair. Basically I needed a lot to see an effect but the more you use, the dirtier your hair feels lol
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: So, at first I got this from Target, as part of a "hair meets wardrobe" kit. I immediately loved it. It is so easy to use, effortless to put on, and it does wonders for my hair. I will definitely purchase this as my main hair product in the future. I usually put it on when my hair is wet, so that is effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia H

customer_reviews.title: Great for fine low porosity hair. Great volume. Great smell
customer_reviews.text: Gives my fine low porosity hair volume! It smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Love this spray
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray! It smells so good and I find it is not very drying. It gives you nice textured hair but your hair stays soft
customer_reviews.author: camille chavez

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: So, the product that arrived isn't what I ordered, but is the same brand. I gave it three stars as because what did show up from this brand works well, but I wanted sea salt spray.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, reminds you of the ocean. Leaves that beach texture in your hair. Beware though hard to run a comb through after applying, but makes it even more like that summer hair I'm striving for!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Koh

customer_reviews.title: ... sea salt spray has enabled me to still have amazing day the next day
customer_reviews.text: Using this sea salt spray has enabled me to still have amazing day the next day, without having to use dry shampoo. I know a lot of people use dry shampoo and sea salt spray, but I just really dislike the way dry shampoo makes my hair feel.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: makes by hair thicker and gives it texture with volume
customer_reviews.author: Munjal Kamdar

customer_reviews.title: Great salt spray
customer_reviews.text: I got this product as a sample size in my Target Beauty box and it was the first salt spray that I've tried. It helps to create texture and keep my waves looking nice throughout the day, without causing my hair to be stiff. It also has a great scent.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Lemons

customer_reviews.title: I have really thin hair and was looking for something ...
customer_reviews.text: I have really thin hair and was looking for something to help make my hair look thicker. While it doesn't give me a full head of hair, it does give me a thicker healthier look.
customer_reviews.author: Baby PhD

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third bottle and will never use another brand. This holds my natural waves very well but keep them soft. Does a decent job with keeping the frizz down.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schraedley

customer_reviews.title: Good hold but still leaves my hair feeling greasy the next day
customer_reviews.text: I have to be very careful not to use too much or my hair feels greasy and weighed down the next day. Pretty average with other sprays I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Lizelle

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I Love this stuff. Give me a natural wavy look.
customer_reviews.author: Steph378

customer_reviews.title: Smells great works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I got this product through a birch box. By the way absolutely love birch box. I now get it through Amazon subscribe and save. I am a life time customer now! I even bought a couple bottles for Christmas presents for friends. Every time my best friend comes over she loves to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Matthew Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Styling Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hair styling product. I have a slight cowlick and this thickens my hair enough that it does not show.
customer_reviews.author: JudithLynn

customer_reviews.title: I have fine hair and used it with my heated rollers on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair and used it with my heated rollers on dry hair. It made my hair sticky, clump together, and dirty feeling. I bought 4 bottles and returned 3. I have been trying to find a product I loved to use called Sea Plasma by Focus (it went out of business last year). The closest product to replace Sea Plasma has been ME by Matrix. It works well for heated rollers and on dry hair.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Raines

customer_reviews.title: I use it every day!
customer_reviews.text: It gives my super thin blond light baby hair volume that I can work with. I don't have to tease it much. It last longer than other sprays and not as expensive as some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Mom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This was disappointing. It doesn't provide any grip or texture whatsoever. I much prefer KMS Sea Salt spray.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: I love this spray. Doesn't weigh your hair down and gives a nice wavy curl. It doesn't last to the next day, but I wouldn't expect it to. Great smell too.
customer_reviews.author: The Girls

customer_reviews.title: Gives Lift to the hair and not too sticky.
customer_reviews.text: Gives Lift to the hair and not too sticky. I can't find it at Walgreens anymore so I shopped at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Apallo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Also like "totally baked" by Toni and guy for texture as well.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Gives great texture to my hair without ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Gives great texture to my hair without a residue.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: It smells good, but I don't find it does anything for my hair. My hair is fine and wavy and a product like this should work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Only spray that works on my thick hair!
customer_reviews.text: I got a small free sample of this spray once and I've loved it ever since. I have extremely long and thick hair that is so bluntly straight. My hair never waves unless I leave it up while it's wet but then my hair ends up being so flat in the morning. You can use this spray when your hair is dry and it actually makes my hair wave. Since my hair is so thick, I find that I have to spray a generous amount but it actually works and keeps in my hair all day. The only spray I've found that works and smells really good, I probably will never use a different sea salt spray!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Trautman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: did nothing for my hair, left it dry and nasty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not do anything to my fine hair. Had to return for refund :/
customer_reviews.author: MMad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product will be buying again. Actually does what it says!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Camille

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've never been able to control my curls, but this this stuff makes it easy and it smells divine! I think I love the scent more than anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Jarrell

customer_reviews.title: I can end up with perfect beachy waves without washing my hair
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a hair miracle. Between a little dry shampoo and this stuff, I can end up with perfect beachy waves without washing my hair. I don't use this with my hair down, it makes it too big. BUT in a high pony a bit of this makes it look like I just came back from riding in the waves. And it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura, the Mainah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My teenage granddaughter LOVES this product. It does what it promises.
customer_reviews.author: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Terribly strong and overly perfumed
customer_reviews.text: Can't stand the scent. Terribly strong and overly perfumed. Gave me an instant headache.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Dane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for beach wave look
customer_reviews.text: Love the beach wave look that this product gives me!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Take me to the sea...
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I love the smell; it makes me think of Gulf Shores and the other beaches along the Alabama/Florida coast. I love the texture it gives my hair. It's way too expensive for what it is and it is totally a useless indulgence, but everytime I spray my hair I am glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra W Perry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing. Gives my wavy hair a bit more of a defined curls look. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzy

customer_reviews.title: The BEST sea salt texture wave spray I've come across
customer_reviews.text: The BEST sea salt texture wave spray I've come across! It is dying out in stores. Very happy amazon sells it! I've stocked up!
customer_reviews.author: Crystyle

product_meta.title: Toni & Guy Casual Sea Salt Spray, Salt Spray, 6.8 oz
product_meta.description: Create texture and body with light hold. Suitable for all hair types and perfect for achieving a lived-in, beach look. Spray evenly from root to tip on towel-dried or dry hair and work through to create tousled waves with natural movement.
feature_bullets: Adds texture and body for a lived-in beach look
Provides light hold and natural movement
